name: Getting Companies to fight for you 🤼‍♂
speaker: Aravind Panicker
description: Working at our dream company- Isn't that a dream we all have ‼ Wish you could interact with Mentors from the Industry, who've been there, accomplished their goals and are doing what they love ❓.Join us on 25th November for the first edition of Mentor Connect with Mr. Aravind Panicker, Application Engineer at Google.

name: Finding your true passion
speaker: Ann Andrews
description: The impact that a proper career choice could have on your life in monumental. Still on the search for your true passion? Join us for Mentor Connect on 2nd December, at 8:00 PM and listen to Ann Andrews, Founder - Techfunic, as she shares some tips to help you find your true passion.

name: Finding your true passion
speaker: Umer Abdussalam
description: Leveraging the Powers of Social Media 🦸🏽‍♂️:  Some studies say that over 4.26 Billion people are on social media worldwide 🌎 That is more than half of the entire population of the human race‼️ Regardless of whether you’re looking to build a community, or you’re searching for the next consumer for your product, Social Media is your go-to place. But are we really leveraging its true potential 🤔
